translations: n.分析师；分析家；[分化]分析员（analyst 的复数）

phrs.translation: 商业分析员；经营分析人员

sentences.sentence: City analysts forecast huge profits this year.
sentences.translation: 伦敦金融分析家预测今年的利润非常丰厚。

sentences.sentence: Dismal economic findings have analysts fearing a double dip.
sentences.translation: 对经济低潮期调查的结果使分析家们担忧会有一个再度衰退。

sentences.sentence: I was impressed by the high calibre of the researchers and analysts.
sentences.translation: 我对这些研究员和分析员的优秀才干印象深刻。
